name: movie-list-app
description: Aplicação de lista de filmes favoritos

scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.clean: cd backend && npm run clean && cd ../frontend && rm -rf build node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.deploy:backend: cd backend && npm run build && railway up
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && railway up

author: Movie List App
